EmailTemplate.name: 202011_Americas_VBACE.202011_Americas_VBACE.Whole Emails Test
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for joining us at VBACE!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=customer}},
While we missed engaging with you in person, we wanted to say thank you for attending our virtual booth last week at VBACE.
Honeywell embraced the VBACE digital format and hosted a day one keynote session with aviation industry leaders. The topic on “The new era of safe and healthy travel” proved to be very insightful. If you missed this great discussion watch it here <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/W6fCQ4n5Lms1PZjD5YpxjR?]]>.
Be sure to check our year end incentives and discounts designed to save operators time and money and keep you flying in 2021. Click here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2020/12/nbaa-2020-is-now-vbace?utm_source=webinar&utm_medium=event&utm_campaign=20_nbaa]]> to find out more!
On behalf of the entire Honeywell team, thanks again for spending time with us 'virtually' at VBACE 2020. We are looking forward to greeting you in person in 2021.
Sincerely, Bill Hurst Vice President of Business Aviation Aftermarket Sales Honeywell Aerospace
Let’s Connect! Sign up <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]> to receive exclusive communications about offerings, events, news, surveys, special offers and related topics via telephone, email and other forms of electronic communication (e.g., communications through social media platforms), collectively 'marketing communications'.
